channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Karanga The First Voice
channel.desc: Ten iwi around the motu explore and celebrate karanga in contemporary Aotearoa. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: ?paki
channel.desc: P?nia Papa uses games, music and activities to teach M?ori. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: T?ku Reo
channel.desc: Professor John Moorfield's M?ori language course supported by an interactive website. (R).

channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora
channel.desc: Mauri Reo, Mauri Ora is a series of programme content that focus on entertaining and education K?hungahunga and Kura Tuatahi audiences. (R).

channel.title: Tamariki Haka
channel.desc: Profiles kura kapa haka from across Aotearoa, showcasing the dynamic skills of our future haka exponents.

channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora
channel.desc: P?p? Tei Nohotima shares waiata and karakia using r?kau, p?kura (short sticks) and t?t?t?rea (long sticks). (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Pathfinders
channel.desc: Whanganui-born Chef Peter Gordon is known for pioneering fusion cuisine. He passionately connects food and our communities. He shares his vision for the future of food in Aotearoa. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Autaia Haka Theatre
channel.desc: Alfriston reflects on the realities of being M?ori in a mainstream school, confronting identity, inclusion, and belonging issues. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Autaia Haka Theatre
channel.desc: A raw and honest performance that speaks to the M?ori experience in mainstream spaces - Alfriston makes their mark with strenght and authenticity. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ata Toi + Wai
channel.desc: Join presenters Te Aumihi Hohepa and Tawhanga Rika as they celebrate the world of M?ori art. Actor Antonio Te Maioha discusses his work as an actor and his many projects. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Going Native
channel.desc: NEW: Drew heads to a Mohawk First Nation on Lake Ontario that hosts one of the largest Tattoo Gatherings in Canada. There he meets dozens of native artists making their cultural marks. Then he goes on traditional indigenous hairstyle journey.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: First Weapons
channel.desc: NEW: Phil Breslin meets weapon makers and science experts, lifting the lid on the genius of Australia's oldest and most innovative weapons.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: K?inga Whenua
channel.desc: Capturing the critical moments of building, developing and living on your tupuna whenua. The Panapa whanau show Pio around Te Mahurehure urban marae. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Mataora Digital
channel.desc: Amazing content curated for rangatahi, wh?nau and pakeke. Made by the Mataora team. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: The Hui
channel.desc: A compelling mix of current affairs investigations, human interest and arts and culture stories. Made with the support of Te M?ngai P?ho and NZ on Air. (R).
